items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package for easy file uploads to Amazon S3. This package simplifies the process of configuring AWS S3 credentials and uploading files to S3 buckets in Node.js applications.

items.content_html: SootheJS is a modern, lightweight JavaScript framework designed for building Single Page Applications (SPAs) with ease and efficiency. Inspired by the principles of simplicity and relaxation, SootheJS aims to provide developers with a seamless and enjoyable development experience.
